skill.name: dependency-upgrade
skill.description: Manage major dependency version upgrades with compatibility analysis, staged rollout, and comprehensive testing. Use when upgrading framework versions, updating major dependencies, or managing breaking changes in libraries.
skill.summary: Manage major dependency version upgrades with compatibility analysis, staged rollout, and comprehens...

security_audit.summary: No data theft, execution, or persistence patterns were found. Commands and scripts are illustrative and align with dependency upgrade guidance.

content.value_statement: Major upgrades can break builds and tests without a plan. This skill provides staged steps, compatibility checks, and testing guidance.
actual_capabilities: Explains semantic versioning impact for upgrade scope
Outlines staged upgrade phases with test checkpoints
Provides compatibility matrix examples for common stacks
Details testing strategies across unit, integration, and E2E
Includes rollback and lock file management guidance
Covers automation setup for Renovate and Dependabot
limitations: Does not run upgrade commands or modify files
Examples are centered on JavaScript and npm tooling
Requires manual review of changelogs and migration guides
Does not generate a project specific compatibility matrix

use_cases.title: Plan a React major upgrade
use_cases.description: Create a phased plan with compatibility checks and tests before changing core UI dependencies.

use_cases.title: Establish upgrade policies
use_cases.description: Define automated update rules and review gates for major and minor updates.

use_cases.title: Design upgrade test coverage
use_cases.description: Map unit, integration, and E2E tests to validate behavior after upgrades.

prompt_templates.title: Quick upgrade plan
prompt_templates.scenario: Small app with one major upgrade
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a simple staged plan to upgrade React from 17 to 18 with testing checkpoints.

prompt_templates.title: Compatibility checklist
prompt_templates.prompt: List compatibility checks for React, React DOM, and React Router upgrades, including peer dependencies.

prompt_templates.title: Testing strategy
prompt_templates.prompt: Propose a testing strategy to validate a major framework upgrade in a production web app.

prompt_templates.title: Automation setup
prompt_templates.prompt: Recommend Renovate and Dependabot rules for handling major updates safely and reducing noise.

output_examples.input: Plan an upgrade from React 16 to 18 with minimal downtime.
output: Audit current versions and peer dependencies
Upgrade one major version at a time with tests
Update router and testing libraries in sequence
Run full regression suite and monitor after release

best_practices: Upgrade one major version at a time
Run tests after each dependency change
anti_patterns: Upgrading all dependencies in one step

faq.question: Which ecosystems does this skill cover?
faq.answer: It focuses on npm and JavaScript examples, but the planning concepts apply to other ecosystems.

faq.question: Are there limits on project size?
faq.answer: There are no size limits, but larger projects need more test coverage and staging.

faq.question: Can it integrate with CI pipelines?
faq.answer: Yes, it provides guidance for automation tools that fit CI workflows.

faq.question: Does it access or store my data?
faq.answer: No, it is guidance only and does not access files or environment data.

faq.question: What if tests fail after an upgrade?
faq.answer: Use the rollback plan, isolate the breaking change, and proceed with smaller steps.

faq.question: How does it compare to upgrade scripts?
faq.answer: It provides structured guidance and planning, not automated code changes.
